field.name: acknowledgements
field.value: Bruce Novak, a former teacher in grades 6-12, helped supervise English teacher education at the University of Chicago. He has taught Communications, Foundations and Philosophy of Education, Humanities, and Social Sciences at the University of Chicago, Northern Illinois University, and Truman College. Among other venues, he has published in the American Educational Research Journal and is co-author, with Jeff Wilhelm, of Literacy for Love and Wisdom: Being the Book and Being the Change. He has organized five AEPL conferences, including the one upcoming in Estes Park, CO, 2011.
